label: Public Information Campaigns
description: Coordinated approach to planning, implementing and evaluating information campaigns in the broad domain of food and agriculture. Students work with groups, agencies and organizations in designing communication campaigns strategies and tactics. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and Composition I course.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and Composition I course.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Sophomore, Junior, or Senior class standing.
